feed.title: Category: with | Love With Food Intern Blog

entry.title: first love with food blog post
entry.content:
Hey! Welcome to my blog! This is my first (second) post on my octopress blog. I am currently interning at Love with Food in Santa Clara. On this blog I will talk about my experience programming things.

This blog will be a combination of code snippets, relevant media, and maybe some stuff about my experience here thrown in.
